name: Empirical Evidence
flavor_text: Under duress, a soul will say whatever they think you want to hear. Trust your own eyes.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Ricochet Rounds

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: Improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: Automatically reloads the magazine and improves weapon handling when wounded—even when this weapon is stowed.
perks.name: Pulse Monitor

perks.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for a short duration.
perks.name: Tunnel Vision

perks.description: Substantially improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for an improved duration.
perks.name: Tunnel Vision

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion

perks.description: Precision final blows grant a stacking range bonus to this weapon. Non-precision final blows remove range stacks but grant bonus accuracy and stability when all range stacks have been removed.
perks.name: Encore

perks.description: Grants greatly increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion for a short duration.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion Enhanced

perks.description:
Precision final blows grant a stacking range bonus to this weapon. Non-precision final blows remove range stacks but grant bonus accuracy and stability when all range stacks have been removed.
Effect duration is improved.
perks.name: Encore

perks.description: After defeating a target, this weapon fires, charges, or draws more slowly and deals increased damage for a brief time.
perks.name: Adagio

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: After defeating a target, this weapon fires, charges, or draws more slowly and deals increased damage for an improved time.
perks.name: Adagio

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one target. Improves handling.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Defeating combatants with this weapon generates an improved small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage for an improved duration from melee final blows and defeating targets with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for an improved duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.
perks.name: Psychohack
